instructions: In a web browser, visit http://icloud.com/find and log in with your Apple ID. Click All Devices , then click the device you wish to disable Find My iPhone on. Click Erase iPhone or Erase iPad . Note: For Apple Watch, click the (X) next to your device. When the device has been erased, click Remove from Account This procedure is also for devices that will not power on or cannot access the internet.
